com.github.sviperll.text

Class Layout<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sviperll.text.Layout<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - marks given renderable with it's format
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layoutable<T>

    public class Layout<T>
extends Object
implements Layoutable<T>
    Can be used as layout.

    Layout&lt;Html&gt; is supposed to generate html output.

    Author:
    Victor Nazarov
